metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7074 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in PowerDNS before 3.4.11 and 4.0.2, and PowerDNS recursor before 4.0.4, allowing an attacker in position of man-in-the-middle to alter the content of an AXFR because of insufficient validation of TSIG signatures. A missing check that the TSIG record is the last one, leading to the possibility of parsing records that are not covered by the TSIG signature.

criterions.comment: pdns package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.2-1').
pdns-recursor package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.4-1').
